title: By the Spring of Life

tokens.lyric: We're marching to the blessed land of

lines.raw: [G]We're marching to the blessed land of [C]Canaan with delight,[G]

tokens.lyric: We're leaving all our heavy burdens

lines.raw: We're leaving all our heavy burdens[A7] here[D7].

tokens.lyric: last we are released and free from

lines.raw: At[G] last we are released and free from[C] being slaves to[G] sin,
We're coming to the blessed [D7]spring of lif[G]e.
Com[G]ing to the spring where [C]living water [G]flows;

tokens.lyric: In glory we'll be living evermo

lines.raw: In glory we'll be living evermo[A7]re.[D7]
[G]Going to the land where [C]freely flows the s[G]pring,

tokens.lyric: O guide us with your pillars, Lord, of fire and of cloud,

lines.raw: O guide us with your pillars, Lord, of fire and of cloud,

tokens.lyric: O give us paths to follow with our lives.

lines.raw: O give us paths to follow with our lives.

tokens.lyric: The moment that we cross the Jordan River is at hand,

lines.raw: The moment that we cross the Jordan River is at hand,

tokens.lyric: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

lines.raw: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

tokens.lyric: Our thirsting hearts receive with joy the manna from above,

lines.raw: Our thirsting hearts receive with joy the manna from above,

tokens.lyric: Your precious food will always be our strength

lines.raw: Your precious food will always be our strength

tokens.lyric: So if the future finds us lacking we will not despair

lines.raw: So if the future finds us lacking we will not despair

tokens.lyric: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

lines.raw: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.
